Advanced Targeting Module.name: Продвинутый поиск
Advanced Targeting Module.description: While driving this personal vehicle, you gain a +2 bonus to your Accuracy Checks and to Magic Checks for offensive spells ( @ICON[offensive] ) you cast.

Aerial Module.name: Полётный модуль
Aerial Module.description:
(считается за два включенных модуляS)

This personal vehicle can fly, and its distance becomes ×3.

While you are driving this personal vehicle, your melee attacks can target flying creatures, and none of the creatures inside the personal vehicle can be targeted by melee attacks unless the attacker is flying or is somehow able to reach flying targets.

These benefits do not apply while the personal vehicle is inactive or grounded, while you are in Crisis, or while you are covering another creature with the Guard action. Additionally, if a creature aboard this personal vehicle suffers air, bolt or ice damage during a conflict, the benefits of this module cease until the start of your next turn.

Anti-Element Module.name: Анти-Элемент
Anti-Element Module.description:
Each time you enable this module on your personal vehicle, choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire or ice. Creatures aboard this personal vehicle are treated as being Resistant to the chosen damage type until this module remains enabled.

  • Targets Receive: @TYPE[affinity air resistance], @TYPE[affinity bolt resistance], @TYPE[affinity earth resistance], @TYPE[affinity fire resistance], or @TYPE[affinity ice resistance]

Bow Module.name: Bow Module
Bow Module.description:
This weapon belongs to the bow Category.

A personal vehicle with this module enabled cannot have any other weapon modules enabled.

Cannon Module.name: Cannon Module
Cannon Module.description:
This weapon belongs to the firearm Category.

A personal vehicle with this module enabled cannot have any other weapon modules enabled.

Claw Module.name: Claw Module
Claw Module.description:
This weapon belongs to the brawling Category.

This weapon can be used to interact with the scene as if it were a free hand.

Claymore Module.name: Claymore Module
Claymore Module.description:
This weapon belongs to the sword Category.

A personal vehicle with this module enabled cannot have any other weapon modules enabled.

Counterstrike Module.name: Контрудар
Counterstrike Module.description:
After a creature aboard this personal vehicle is hit by a ranged attack, if you are driving this vehicle, you may spend 1 Inventory Point. If you do, the attacker suffers 10 physical damage (after their attack has been resolved). This amount increases by 5 damage if you are level 20 or higher, or by 10 damage if you are level 40 or higher.

  • You Lose: @LOSS[1 ip]

  • Target Suffers: @DMG[10 physical], @DMG[15 physical], or @DMG[20 physical]

Esoteric Module.name: Esoteric Module
Esoteric Module.description:
This weapon belongs to the arcane Category.

A personal vehicle with this module enabled cannot have any other weapon modules enabled.

Excavation Module.name: Экскавация
Excavation Module.description: This personal vehicle can burrow through the ground and is equipped with powerful lights.

Exoskeleton.name: Экзоскелет
Exoskeleton.description:
This personal vehicle may have up to 2 weapon modules, 1 armor module and any number of support modules enabled.

If you use the @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.kMQH13lhWY4Mlbh8]{Compression Tech} Skill with this personal vehicle, ignore the IP cost.

Expanded Plating Module.name: Расширенная Обшивка
Expanded Plating Module.description:
(MECHA AND STEED FRAMES ONLY)

While you are driving this personal vehicle, if it has an active Heavy, Runic, or Standard Plating module, all passengers aboard may treat their Defense and Magic Defense scores as being equal to those provided by the armor module in question (they may still use their normal scores if those would be better).

Machine Gun Module.name: Machine Gun Module
Machine Gun Module.description:
This weapon belongs to the firearm Category.

A personal vehicle with this module enabled cannot have any other weapon modules enabled. Additionally, when you perform the Attack action and attack with this weapon module, you may perform two separate attacks instead of one (against the same target or against different targets). If you do, both attacks follow the rules for two-weapon fighting: each attack loses the multi property and cannot gain it, and you treat the High Roll of each Accuracy Check as being equal to 0 when determining damage.

Magistatic Module.name: Магистатик
Magistatic Module.description:
After you pay the MP cost of an Arcanum, spell, or verse (see High Fantasy, page 138), if you are driving this personal vehicle and have an arcane weapon equipped, you recover 5 Mind Points, or 10 Mind Points if the cost was equal to or higher than 30 MP.

  • You Recover: @GAIN[5 mp], or @GAIN[10 mp]

Mecha.name: Меха
Mecha.description: This personal vehicle may have up to 2 weapon modules, 1 armor module, and any number of support modules enabled.

Power Module.name: Мощь
Power Module.description:
(только для рамы Экзоскелет и Меха)

While driving this personal vehicle, you gain a +2 bonus to all Opposed Checks that rely on brute force or physical resistance.

Rapid Interface Module.name: Быстрый Интерфейс
Rapid Interface Module.description: When you enter this personal vehicle on your turn during a conflict, you may immediately perform an additional action.

Scythe Module.name: Scythe Module
Scythe Module.description:
This weapon belongs to the heavy Category.

A personal vehicle with this module enabled cannot have any other weapon modules enabled.

Seafarer Module.name: Мореход
Seafarer Module.description: This personal vehicle can travel on water and underwater.

Seat Module.name: Сиденье
Seat Module.description:
(только для рамы Меха и Скакун)

This personal vehicle can transport an additional human-sized passenger.

Secondary Offensive Module.name: Вторичное наступление
Secondary Offensive Module.description:
(только для рамы Экзоскелет и Меха)

Each time you enable this module on your personal vehicle, choose one disabled weapon module. As long as the chosen module is disabled and this module is enabled, you may use an action to perform a free attack with that weapon module.

Sensor Module.name: Сенсор
Sensor Module.description: While driving this personal vehicle, you gain a +2 bonus to Open Checks made to examine nearby creatures, items, and locations.

Shield Module.name: Shield Module
Shield Module.description:
(EXOSKELETON AND MECHA ONLY)

While driving this personal vehicle, you gain a +2 bonus to Defense and a +2 bonus to Magic Defense. Additionally, this weapon module does not count as a “weapon”: instead, it counts as an equipped shield. This module cannot be equipped in your main hand slot, unless you have acquired the Dual Shieldbearer Skill (see Core Rulebook, page 197). If you have, your Twin Shields deal 2 extra damage (this is cumulative if you have two Shield modules enabled at the same time).

Steed.name: Скакун
Steed.description:
This personal vehicle may have up to 1 weapon module, 1 armor module and any number of support modules enabled.

If you use the @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.HCzLtYgEWScIeJNq]{Heart in the Engine} Skill with this personal vehicle, ignore the MP cost.

Trident Module.name: Trident Module
Trident Module.description:
This weapon belongs to the spear Category.

A personal vehicle with this module enabled cannot have any other weapon modules enabled.

Turbo Module.name: Турбо
Turbo Module.description: While driving this personal vehicle, you gain a +2 bonus to all Opposed Checks that rely on speed and rapid maneuvers.
